HomePage.title: Get Tailored
HomePage.about: Create your personal hotel guest profile and instantly share it with your favorite hotels. Enjoy a tailored experience that meets your preferences and needs.
HomePage.label: Label

Benefits.label: Why Create Your Profile?
Benefits.title: Enhance Your Travel Experience
Benefits.description: Unlock a personalized and seamless stay by creating your profile. Share your preferences once and enjoy tailored services at every hotel you visit.

1.title: Personalized Comfort
1.description: Set your room preferences—like temperature, pillow type, and amenities—in advance, ensuring your room feels just like home upon arrival.

2.title: Effortless Check-In
2.description: Save time with a streamlined check-in process. Your details are pre-shared, allowing you to skip the paperwork and head straight to relaxation.

3.title: Customized Dining Experiences
3.description: Enjoy meals crafted to your taste by sharing your dietary preferences and restrictions, making every dining experience delightful and worry-free.

4.title: Tailored Wellness Options
4.description: Receive spa treatments and fitness recommendations that match your health needs and preferences for a rejuvenating stay.

Features.label: Features
Features.title: What helps us stand out from peers
Features.description: By being the first to empower guests with control over their information in one place.

1.title: Unique Offering
1.description: Keyguests provides a pioneering service by empowering guests with personalized QR codes that enhance their hospitality experience.

2.title: Enhanced Privacy
2.description: The platform prioritizes guest privacy by securely encrypting health needs and preference information, building trust with users.

3.title: Increased Guest Satisfaction
3.description: By allowing for customized experiences, Keyguests helps hotels improve guest satisfaction and loyalty.

4.title: Contactless Technology
4.description: The use of modern technology to personalize guest experiences aligns with current trends in customer service and hospitality.

5.title: Competitive Advantage
5.description: Being the first to offer such a service model gives Keyguests a significant edge over competitors in the hospitality sector.

6.title: Sustainability and Social Responsibility
6.description: Keyguests helps hotels develop and implement sustainability initiatives based on guest preferences for eco- friendly practices, promoting green tourism.

Team.label: Team
Team.title: Meet the Team
Team.about: We strive to redefine guest satisfaction through technological innovation and a commitment to exceptional service.

1.title: CEO
1.description: Entrepreneur with a background in hospitality management and administration from Glion Institute of Higher Education and Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts.

2.title: CTO
2.description: Software Engineer with over 6 years of experience working in wide range of industries, from fintech to healthcare.

Contact.label: Contact
Contact.title: Connect With Us
Contact.description: This solution allows hotel staff to access relevant data to customize services while preserving the privacy of the guest. The platform embodies the principle of mutual respect and collaboration between guests and hotel staff.

form.success: Thank you, we will get back to you shortly!

Flow.title: Grow Your Business
Flow.description: Keyguests offers the following primary products and services

1.title: Personalized QR Code Generation
1.description: Guests can create unique codes that encapsulate their health and preference data.

2.title: Data Encryption and Security Services
2.description: Ensuring the privacy and security of guest information through advanced encryption technologies.

3.title: Integration with Hotel Management Systems
3.description: Allowing for seamless access to guest data by hotel staff for customized service delivery.

4.title: Customer Support and Training
4.description: Providing ongoing assistance and training to hotel staff for effective usage of the platform.
